ygData.subject: RE: Steel Boning
ygData.msgSnippet: Is that all it s used for no other purpose?  B(
ygData.messageBody:
Is that all it's used for no other purpose? B(

--- "Sturgill, Jim" <JimS@...> wrote:
> From: "Sturgill, Jim" <JimS@...>
>
> Ok it's useless so I will take it off your hands....
> Ok actually its used in making braced leathor armor.
> A tailor will buy
> it from you. How much? Depends on a lot of things
> but as much as you
> can get.
> Bonzz
>

> >From: Ah DoDo [mailto:novaperson@...]

> Craft weapons. 3.
